body: Spellcasters who take this route focus on abilities that protect them and those that counter the spells of others. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—competent caster, enduring armor, flexible counterspell, spellbane counterstrike; 3rd-Tier Abilities—eldritch flight, mirror dodge, spell sieve; 6th-Tier Abilities—eldritch reciprocation.
name: Defensive Caster
